mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT , CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'HH:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT , USER_NICK, BOARD_LIKE ,BOARD_TAG, BAND_NAME FROM BAND_BOARD bb JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) JOIN BAND b USING(BAND_NO) WHERE BAND_NO = ${bandNo} AND BOARD_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
